rows.label: qst711802_msg0001
rows.name:
What matter? Need to refresh
memory on details of test?

rows.label: qst711802_msg0002
rows.name:
Great choice! Knowing exactly
what one up against is important
quality of fighting pro!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0003
rows.name:
Test require friends to find enemy, then
Break! Topple! Launch! Smash! Do all
Driver Combo parts, all in sequence.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0004
rows.name:
Launch will lift enemy off ground,
and Smash will smash back down, as
name implies. Is great power move!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0005
rows.name:
For this test, Gororo want friends to
do whole whammy three times! Should be
no trouble for big fat heroes, Mo-mo?

rows.label: qst711802_msg0006
rows.name:
To make even easier, can do
Driver Combo to any enemy in
any place friends like.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0007
rows.name:
Key is to choose arena and foe to
maximize synergy with Arts and
abilities of team. Every pro know that!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0101
rows.name:
Oohoo, Gororo knew he not
wrong about friends! Knew
would hit nail on head!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0102
rows.name:
Congratulation on completing
test with flying marks!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0103
rows.name:
Gororo not need to see battle by own
self to recognize look of triumph on
faces of friends. Am just that good!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0104
rows.name:
As reward for passing trial, Gororo
give friends choice info about Driver
Combo, straight from Nopon's mouth.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0105
rows.name:
Did friends know that some monsters
have tendency to inflict Topple
on monsters' own selves?

rows.label: qst711802_msg0106
rows.name:
This is reaction to monsters' using
own big moves. Cannot dissipate force,
and so end up flat on ground.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0107
rows.name:
But lucky for Drivers, that perfect
time to butt in with Launch and Smash!
Fighting is all about using openings.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0108
rows.name:
Well, Gororo have to admit, friends
really blast test out of water. Is
sure sign of growth as Drivers!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0109
rows.name:
But final call have to be made after
consult with Blade of Gororo. Gororo
sure friends lack for nothing!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0110
rows.name:
All righty then. Should be all
prepped soon, so come back in
while and can talk business!
